DESCRIPTOR.LABEL: ENA default sample checklist
DESCRIPTOR.NAME: ENA default sample checklist
DESCRIPTOR.DESCRIPTION: Minimum information required for the sample

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Part and developmental stage of organism
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Anatomical and developmental descriptions of the sample site or source material

FIELD.LABEL: cell_type
FIELD.NAME: cell_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: cell type from which the sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: dev_stage
FIELD.NAME: dev_stage
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: if the sample was obtained from an organism in a specific developmental stage, it is specified with this qualifier

FIELD.LABEL: germline
FIELD.NAME: germline
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: the sample described presented in the entry has not undergone somatic genomic rearrangement as part of an adaptive immune response; it is the unrearranged molecule that was inherited from the parental germline

FIELD.LABEL: tissue_lib
FIELD.NAME: tissue_lib
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: tissue library from which sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: tissue_type
FIELD.NAME: tissue_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: tissue type from which the sample was obtained

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Collection event information

FIELD.LABEL: isolation_source
FIELD.NAME: isolation_source
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived

FIELD.LABEL: lat_lon
FIELD.NAME: lat_lon
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: geographical coordinates of the location where the specimen was collected

FIELD.LABEL: collected_by
FIELD.NAME: collected_by
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: name of persons or institute who collected the specimen

FIELD.LABEL: collection date
FIELD.NAME: collection date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date the sample was collected with the intention of sequencing, either as an instance (single point in time) or interval. In case no exact time is available, the date/time can be right truncated i.e. all of these are valid ISO8601 compliant times: 2008-01-23T19:23:10+00:00; 2008-01-23T19:23:10; 2008-01-23; 2008-01; 2008.

TEXT_FIELD.REGEX_VALUE: (^[12][0-9]{3}(-(0[1-9]|1[0-2])(-(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])(T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}(:[0-9]{2})?Z?([+-][0-9]{1,2})?)?)?)?(/[0-9]{4}(-[0-9]{2}(-[0-9]{2}(T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}(:[0-9]{2})?Z?([+-][0-9]{1,2})?)?)?)?)?$)|(^not collected$)|(^not provided$)|(^restricted access$)|(^missing: control sample$)|(^missing: sample group$)|(^missing: synthetic construct$)|(^missing: lab stock$)|(^missing: third party data$)|(^missing: data agreement established pre-2023$)|(^missing: endangered species$)|(^missing: human-identifiable$)

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (country and/or sea)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (country and/or sea)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The location the sample was collected from with the intention of sequencing, as defined by the country or sea. Country or sea names should be chosen from the INSDC country list (http://insdc.org/country.html).

TEXT_VALUE.VALUE: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (region and locality)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (region and locality)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by the specific region name followed by the locality name.

FIELD.LABEL: identified_by
FIELD.NAME: identified_by
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: name of the expert who identified the specimen taxonomically

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: sample collection

FIELD.LABEL: environmental_sample
FIELD.NAME: environmental_sample
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: identifies sequences derived by direct molecular isolation from a bulk environmental DNA sample (by PCR with or without subsequent cloning of the product, DGGE, or other anonymous methods) with no reliable identification of the source organism

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Organism characteristics

FIELD.LABEL: mating_type
FIELD.NAME: mating_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: mating type of the organism from which the sequence was obtained; mating type is used for prokaryotes, and for eukaryotes that undergo meiosis without sexually dimorphic gametes

FIELD.LABEL: sex
FIELD.NAME: sex
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: sex of the organism from which the sample was obtained

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: host description

FIELD.LABEL: lab_host
FIELD.NAME: lab_host
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: scientific name of the laboratory host used to propagate the source organism from which the sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: host scientific name
FIELD.NAME: host scientific name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Scientific name of the natural (as opposed to laboratory) host to the organism from which sample was obtained.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Pointer to physical material
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: References to sample or sample source material in physical resources

FIELD.LABEL: bio_material
FIELD.NAME: bio_material
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique identifier that references the biological material from which the sample was obtained and that ideally exists in a curated collection (e.g. stock centres, seed banks, DNA banks). The ID should have the following structure: name of the institution (institution code) followed by the collection code (if available) and the voucher id (institution_code:collection_code:voucher_id). Please note institution codes and collection codes are taken from a controlled vocabulary maintained by the INSDC: https://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/pub/taxonomy/biocollections/

FIELD.LABEL: culture_collection
FIELD.NAME: culture_collection
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique identifier that references the culture (e.g. live microbial and viral cultures and cell lines) from which the sample has been obtained and that have been deposited in curated culture collections. The ID needs to provide an institution code and the culture id, with optional collection code, in the following structure: (-institution_code:(collection_code):voucher_id. Please note institution codes (and optional collection codes) are taken from a controlled vocabulary maintained by the INSDC: https://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/pub/taxonomy/biocollections/

FIELD.LABEL: specimen_voucher
FIELD.NAME: specimen_voucher
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique identifier that references the physical specimen that remains after the sequence has been obtained and that ideally exists in a curated collection. The ID should have the following structure: name of the institution (institution code) followed by the collection code (if available) and the voucher id (institution_code:collection_code:voucher_id). Please note institution codes and collection codes are taken from a controlled vocabulary maintained by the INSDC: https://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/pub/taxonomy/biocollections/

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Infraspecies information
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Formal and informal infraspecies taxonomic information

FIELD.LABEL: cultivar
FIELD.NAME: cultivar
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: cultivar (cultivated variety) of plant from which sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: ecotype
FIELD.NAME: ecotype
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: a population within a given species displaying genetically based, phenotypic traits that reflect adaptation to a local habitat.

FIELD.LABEL: isolate
FIELD.NAME: isolate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: individual isolate from which the sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: sub_species
FIELD.NAME: sub_species
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: name of sub-species of organism from which sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: variety
FIELD.NAME: variety
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: variety (= varietas, a formal Linnaean rank) of organism from which sample was derived.

FIELD.LABEL: sub_strain
FIELD.NAME: sub_strain
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: name or identifier of a genetically or otherwise modified strain from which sample was obtained, derived from a parental strain (which should be annotated in the strain field; sub_strain from which sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: cell_line
FIELD.NAME: cell_line
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: cell line from which the sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: serotype
FIELD.NAME: serotype
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: serological variety of a species characterized by its antigenic properties

FIELD.LABEL: serovar
FIELD.NAME: serovar
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: serological variety of a species (usually a prokaryote) characterized by its antigenic properties

FIELD.LABEL: strain
FIELD.NAME: strain
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the strain from which the sample was obtained.
